breakfast.description: 6 whole eggs + 200–250 g shrimp omelette + veggies

postSurfShake.description: 2 scoops Critical Whey Vanilla + 5 g creatine

lunch.description: 450 g salmon steak (skin on) + grilled veggies + cucumber + pickles

dinner.description: 2 whole Rock Lobsters + 1 small Barramundi + grilled veggies + 3 egg whites

training: 1.5 hr surfing + full-body gym (Chest Press 4×8 @ 227 lbs / 103 kg)
notes: DAY 9 WORLD RECORD – Fasted 86.2 kg (-3.8 kg from Day 1). 638 g protein, 1.62 kg edible seafood demolished. New all-time protein record beaten again. Chest press +49 lbs in 7 days. Streak = 9.
